settings.code:
<style>
    p,
    h1,
    h2,
    h3 {
        font-family: 'Poppins';
    }

    /* Global style */
    .content {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    /*Page banner style*/
    .page_banner {
        position: relative;
    }

    .page_banner img {
        width: 100%;
    }

    .page_banner .banner_mol {
        display: none;
    }

    .page_banner .banner_box {
        position: absolute;
        top: 50%;
        left: 15%;
        max-width: 36.979vw;
        transform: translateY(-50%);
    }

    .page_banner .banner_box h1 {
        font-size: 2.5vw;
        color: #FFFFFF;
    }

    .page_banner .banner_box p {
        font-size: 1.042vw;
        color: #FFFFFF;
        margin: 1.042vw 0 0 0;
    }

    .page_banner .banner_box a {
        display: inline-block;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        text-align: center;
        color: #000;
        transition: 0.3s;
        margin-top: 4.167vw;
        border-radius: 5.208vw;
        width: 8.542vw;
        height: 2.5vw;
        line-height: 2.5vw;
        border-radius: 5.208vw;
        padding: 0;
        background: #fff;
    }

    .page_banner .banner_box a:hover {
        background: #03F2A6;
    }

    .section_1 {
        padding: 3.771vw 0 4.854vw 0;
        width: 100%;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .section_1 .section_box {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 45.3125vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .section_1 .section_box .bg_swiper {
        position: relative;
    }

    .section_1 .item {
        width: 100%;
        opacity: .6;
    }

    .section_1 .item.swiper-slide-active {
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .section_1 .item .text {
        margin-bottom: 2.34375vw;
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .section_1 .item.swiper-slide-active .text {
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .section_1 .item .text span {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 1.25vw;
        color: #03F2A6;
    }

    .section_1 .item .text h2 {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 2.1vw;
        color: #000;
        margin: 0.521vw 0 0.78125vw 0;
    }

    .section_1 .item .text p {
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        line-height: 1.042vw;
        color: #454545;
        padding-right: 10%;
        height: 3.385vw;
    }

    .section_1 .cursor_btns {
        margin-top: 2.083vw;

    }

    .section_1 .cursor_btns span {
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        color: #646669;
        padding: 0 0 0.521vw 0;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #A1A1A6;
        text-align: center;
        width: auto !important;
        padding: 0 1.302vw;
    }

    .section_1 .cursor_btns span:nth-child(1) {
        padding-left: 0;
    }

    .section_1 .cursor_btns span:last-child {
        padding-right: 0;
    }

    .section_1 .cursor_btns span:hover,
    .section_1 .cursor_btns span.swiper-slide-thumb-active {
        cursor: pointer;
        color: #03F2A6;
        border-bottom: 1px solid #03F2A6;
    }

    .section_2 {
        padding-bottom: 4.854vw;
    }

    .section_2 .sction_box {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .section_2 .sction_box h2 {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 2.1vw;
        color: #000;
        margin-bottom: 4.167vw;
        max-width: 27vw;
    }

    .qMWqRG_carouselContainer,
    .qMWqRG_videosContainer {
        width: 100% !important;
        margin: 0 !important;
    }

    .section_3 {
        padding-bottom: 4.854vw;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box h2 {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 2.1vw;
        color: #000;
        margin-bottom: 4.167vw;
        max-width: 41.667vw;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list {
        display: flex;
        gap: 1.042vw;
        flex-wrap: wrap;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item {
        width: 100%;
        background: #F5F5F7;
        border-radius: 0.78125vw;
        overflow: hidden;
        display: flex;
        align-items: center;
        justify-content: space-between;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item img {
        max-width: 41.667vw;
        width: 100%;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text {
        padding: 0 1.823vw;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text p {
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 1.25vw;
        line-height: 1.458vw;
        color: #000000;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text a {
        display: inline-block;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        text-align: center;
        color: #fff;
        transition: 0.3s;
        margin-top: 4.167vw;
        border-radius: 5.208vw;
        width: 8.542vw;
        height: 2.5vw;
        line-height: 2.5vw;
        border-radius: 5.208vw;
        padding: 0;
        background: #000;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text a:hover {
        background: #03F2A6;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list>div:nth-child(2) .text {
        order: -1;
    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list>div:nth-child(3),
    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list>div:nth-child(4) {
        width: calc(50% - 0.521vw);
        flex-direction: column;
        align-items: flex-start;

    }

    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list>div:nth-child(3) .text,
    .section_3 .sction_box .product_list>div:nth-child(4) .text {
        padding: 1.823vw;
    }

    /* specs */
    .specs {
        padding: 0 0 6.25vw 0;
    }

    .specs_box {
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .specs_box h2 {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 2.917vw;
        color: #000;
        margin-bottom: 4.729vw;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .specs_box .bottom_p p {
        font-size: 0.625vw;
        line-height: 0.833vw;
        color: #86868B;
        padding: 1.5vw 0;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .specs_box ul {
        margin: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul {
        display: flex;
        align-items: flex-start;
        justify-content: flex-start;
        padding: 1vw 0;
        border-bottom: 0.052vw solid #D9D9D9;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li {
        width: 37%;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) {
        width: 26%;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul {
        padding-top: 0;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
        width: 35%;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(1) {
        width: 15%;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li p,
    .specs_box .item ul li span {
        font-size: 0.885vw;
        color: #646669;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li div {
        padding-bottom: 1.042vw;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li span {
        font-weight: 600;
    }

    .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 1.25vw;
        color: #000;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2),
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) {
        text-align: center;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) p,
    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) p {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 1.667vw;
        color: #000;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) img {
        max-width: 11.458vw;
    }

    .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) img {
        max-width: 10.417vw;
    }

    .specs_box .item:last-child ul {
        padding: 0;
        border: none;
    }

    .specs_box .item:last-child ul li:nth-child(1) {
        border: 0;
        padding: 0;
    }

    .specs_box .item:last-child ul a {
        display: inline-block;
        padding: 0.625vw 1.25vw;
        background: #000;
        border-radius: 3.125vw;
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        color: #fff;
        transition: .4s;
    }

    .specs_box .item:last-child ul a:hover {
        background: #03F2A6;
    }

    /* section_4 */
    .section_4 .section_box {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .section_4 .section_box h2 {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 2.1vw;
        color: #000;
        margin-bottom: 4.167vw;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .said_btn {
        padding: 0 10%;
    }

    .said_btn .item {
        text-align: center;
        cursor: pointer;
    }

    .said_btn .item img {
        width: 70%;
        height: 5.208vw;
        object-fit: contain;
    }

    .said_btn .item span {
        display: inline-block;
        width: 4.583vw;
        height: 0.104vw;
        background: #1F1F1F;
        opacity: 0;
    }

    .said_btn .item.swiper-slide-thumb-active span {
        opacity: 1;
    }

    .said_swiper {
        padding: 1.5625vw 0 4.167vw 0 !important;
    }

    .said_text p {
        max-width: 32.292vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
        font-size: 1.042vw;
        line-height: 1.458vw;
        text-align: center;
        color: #000000;
    }

    .said_text .swiper-button-next,
    .said_text .swiper-button-prev {
        width: 1.875vw;
        height: 1.875vw;
        border-radius: 50%;
        border: 0.104vw solid #000;
        top: 0;
        margin: 0;
    }

    .said_text .swiper-button-next:hover,
    .said_text .swiper-button-prev:hover {
        background: #00CC88;
        border-color: #00CC88;
    }

    .said_text .swiper-button-next:after,
    .said_text .swiper-button-prev:after {
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: #000;
    }

    .swiper-pagination-bullet-active {
        background-color: #000 !important;
    }

    .section_5 {
        padding: 4.583vw 0 6.667vw 0;
        background: #F5F5F7;
        margin-top: 1.042vw;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box {
        width: 100%;
        max-width: 66.667vw;
        margin: 0 auto;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box h2 {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 2.1vw;
        color: #000;
        margin-bottom: 4.167vw;
        text-align: center;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list {
        display: flex;
        justify-content: space-between;
        gap: 1.042vw;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item {
        flex: 1;
        background: #FFFFFF;
        border-radius: 15px;
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item:hover img {
        transform: scale(1.1);
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog-image {
        overflow: hidden;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog-image img {
        transition: .4s;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog_text {
        padding: 1.823vw;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog_text h3 {
        font-weight: 500;
        font-size: 1.25vw;
        line-height: 1.458vw;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog_text p {
        font-weight: 600;
        font-size: 0.833vw;
        line-height: 1.25vw;
        color: #34FF9E;
        margin: 2.083vw 0 0 0;
    }

    .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item:hover .blog_text p {
        text-decoration: underline;
    }

    @media (max-width:768px) {
        .content {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        /*Page banner  mol style*/
        .page_banner .banner_pc {
            display: none;
        }

        .page_banner .banner_mol {
            display: block;
        }

        .page_banner .banner_box {
            left: 0;
            max-width: 100%;
            top: 10%;
            padding: 0 8vw;
            transform: inherit;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .page_banner .banner_box h1 {
            font-size: 7.467vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
        }

        .page_banner .banner_box p {
            font-weight: 500;
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 5.333vw;
            margin: 4vw 0 5.333vw 0;
        }

        .page_banner .banner_box a {
            width: 36.8vw;
            height: 10.667vw;
            line-height: 10.667vw;
            border: 0.4vw solid #FFFFFF;
            border-radius: 16vw;
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            padding: 0;
            margin-top: 0;
        }

        .section_1 {
            padding: 16vw 0;
        }

        .section_1 .section_box {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .section_1 .item {
            padding: 0 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_1 .item .text {
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .section_1 .item .text span {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
        }

        .section_1 .item .text h2 {
            font-size: 6.6vw;
            margin: 1.333vw 0 2.667vw 0;
            line-height: 7.667vw;
            height: 16vw;
        }

        .section_1 .item .text p {
            font-size: 3.733vw;
            line-height: 4.8vw;
            height: 25.333vw;
        }

        .section_1 .cursor_btns {
            margin: 5.333vw 0 0 5.333vw;
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .section_1 .cursor_btns span {
            font-size: 3.733vw;
            padding: 0 5vw 2.667vw 5vw;
        }

        /* specs */
        .specs {
            padding: 0 0 12.25vw 0;
        }

        .specs_box {
            padding: 0 5.333vw;
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .specs_box h2 {
            font-size: 7.467vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .specs_box .bottom_p p {
            font-size: 3.2vw;
            line-height: 4.267vw;
        }

        .specs_box .item ul {
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            padding: 1.667vw 0;
            border: none;
        }

        .specs_box .item ul li,
        .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li {
            width: 50%;
            padding: 2.333vw 1vw;
        }

        .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(1) {
            display: none;
        }

        .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) {
            width: 100%;
            border-bottom: 0.267vw solid #D9D9D9;
            padding: 0 0 2.333vw 0;
        }

        .specs_box .item ul li:nth-child(1) p {
            font-size: 5.600vw;
        }

        .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) p,
        .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) p {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            margin: 0 0 9.333vw 0;
        }

        .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(2) img {
            max-width: 35.333vw;
        }

        .specs_box .item:nth-child(1) ul li:nth-child(3) img {
            max-width: 32.667vw;
        }

        .specs_box .item ul li p,
        .specs_box .item ul li span {
            font-size: 4.533vw;
        }

        .specs_box .item:last-child ul a {
            padding: 2.667vw 5.333vw;
            font-weight: 600;
            font-size: 3vw;
            color: #fff;
            border-radius: 16vw;
        }

        .section_2 {
            padding: 0 5.333vw 16vw 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_2 .sction_box {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .section_2 .sction_box h2 {
            font-size: 7.467vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
            max-width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .section_3 {
            padding: 0 5.333vw 16vw 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box h2 {
            font-size: 7.467vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
            max-width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box .product_list {
            gap: 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item {
            flex-direction: column;
            border-radius: 4vw;
            width: 100% !important;
            text-align: center;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item img {
            max-width: 100%;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text {
            padding: 8vw 10.667vw !important;
            order: 1 !important;
            width: 100%;
        }

        .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text p {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 5.333vw;

        }

        .section_3 .sction_box .product_list .item .text a {
            width: 36.8vw;
            height: 10.667vw;
            line-height: 10.667vw;
            border-radius: 16vw;
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            padding: 0;
            margin-top: 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_4 {
            padding: 0 0 16vw 0;
        }

        .section_4 .section_box {
            max-width: 100%;
            padding: 0 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_4 .section_box h2 {
            font-size: 7.467vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
            max-width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .said_btn .item {
            width: 33.333% !important;
        }

        .said_btn .item img {
            height: 23.467vw;
        }

        .said_btn .item span {
            width: 13.867vw;
            height: 0.533vw;
        }

        .said_btn .swiper-wrapper {
            flex-wrap: wrap;
            justify-content: center;
        }

        .said_swiper {
            padding: 10.667vw 0 17.600vw 0 !important;
        }

        .said_text p {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 5.333vw;
            max-width: 68.667vw;
        }

        .said_text .swiper-button-next,
        .said_text .swiper-button-prev {
            width: 6.933vw;
            height: 6.933vw;
            border: 0.533vw solid #000;
            top: 16vw;
        }

        .said_text .swiper-button-next:after,
        .said_text .swiper-button-prev:after {
            font-size: 12px;
        }

        .section_5 {
            padding: 16vw 0 32vw 0;
        }

        .section_5 .section_box {
            max-width: 100%;

        }

        .section_5 .section_box h2 {
            font-size: 7.467vw;
            line-height: 8.533vw;
            max-width: 100%;
            margin-bottom: 10.667vw;
        }

        .section_5 .section_box .blog_list {
            width: 100%;
            overflow-y: auto;
            padding-left: 5.333vw;
            gap: 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item {
            width: 69.333vw;
            flex: none;
        }

        .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog_text {
            padding: 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog_text h3 {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 5.333vw;
        }

        .section_5 .section_box .blog_list .item .blog_text p {
            font-size: 4.267vw;
            line-height: 6.4vw;
            margin: 2.667vw 0 0 0;
        }
    }
</style>
<!-- Page Banner -->
<section class="page_banner">
    <picture>
        <source srcset="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/1_ec987f81-d05a-4ede-8fdb-6ed3873a2086.webp?v=1686279226" media="(max-width: 375px)">
        <source srcset="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/1_ec987f81-d05a-4ede-8fdb-6ed3873a2086.webp?v=1686279226" media="(max-width: 768px)">
        <source srcset="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/1_banner_9c07ffad-27f5-4475-9493-9ad65e9696fd.webp?v=1686279222" media="(max-width: 1080px)">
        <source srcset="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/1_banner_9c07ffad-27f5-4475-9493-9ad65e9696fd.webp?v=1686279222" media="(max-width: 1200px)">
        <source srcset="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/1_banner_9c07ffad-27f5-4475-9493-9ad65e9696fd.webp?v=1686279222" media="(max-width: 1920px)">
        <img src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/1_banner_9c07ffad-27f5-4475-9493-9ad65e9696fd.webp?v=1686279222" alt="">
</source></source></source></source></source></picture>
    <div class="banner_box">
        <h1>Ugreen PowerRoam 1200

<script src="//at.alicdn.com/t/c/font_3829374_iisr31df8w.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/jquery-1.7.2.min.js?v=1624935298"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.shopify.com/s/files/1/0257/5246/9566/files/swiper-bundle.min_23a60c44-0efc-4129-bf9f-c046f688609a.js?v=1655275790"></script>
<script>
    // 定义手机端
    function isMobile768() {
        return window.innerWidth <= 768;
    };
    const ImgBtns = new Swiper(".said_btn", {
        slidesPerView: 5,
        watchSlidesVisibility: true,
    });
    const SaidSwiper = new Swiper('.said_swiper', {
        slidesPerView: 1,
        speed: 1000,
        centeredSlides: true,
        loop: true,
        grabCursor: true,
        autoplay: {
            delay: 5000,
        },
        thumbs: {
            swiper: ImgBtns,
        },
        navigation: {
            nextEl: ".swiper-button-next",
            prevEl: ".swiper-button-prev",
        },
        pagination: {
            el: ".swiper-pagination",
        }
    })
    const cursorBtns = new Swiper(".cursor_btns", {
        slidesPerView: 2.5,
        watchSlidesVisibility: true,
        breakpoints: {
            768: {
                slidesPerView: 5,
            },
        },
    });
    if (isMobile768()) {
        const fitSwiper = new Swiper('.bg_swiper', {
            slidesPerView: 1,
            speed: 1000,
            centeredSlides: true,
            grabCursor: true,
            loop: true,
            autoplay: {
                delay: 5000,
            },
            thumbs: {
                swiper: cursorBtns,
            },
        })
    } else {

        const fitSwiper = new Swiper('.bg_swiper', {
            slidesPerView: 'auto',
            spaceBetween: 25,
            speed: 1000,
            grabCursor: true,
            centeredSlides: true,
            loop: true,
            autoplay: {
                delay: 5000,
            },
            thumbs: {
                swiper: cursorBtns,
            },
        })
    }
</script>
